text: Club Almagro is an Argentine sports club from José Ingenieros, Buenos Aires. Although its headquarters are in the Almagro district. The football team currently plays in the Primera B Nacional, the second division of the Argentine football league system."Tigre Campeón Intermedia 1912 – F.A.F." (Archivo, 2011)1919 en El Sitio de Almagro Fútbol extinto: Columbian ==References== Category:1910s establishments in Argentina Category:1911 establishments Category:Football clubs in Buenos Aires
title: Club Almagro
